message: Let's be fair, 55% for me, 45% for you.
Let's split it evenly down the middle while the money's still worth something!
I'll take a bit more, 58% for me, consider the inflation!
This is a better deal than last round for both of us. Let's be realistic, we both lose if this drags on!
Come on, I'll take 60%, the inflation is killing me!
Okay, Alice, I see how this is going. Let's try a slight advantage for me this time, but we need to close this deal soon. The clock is ticking!
I'm taking 62%, the pressure is on, inflation is eating away my share!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you a larger share than you'll likely see if this continues. Take the deal now before we both lose out!
I'm willing to risk it, 64% for me. Inflation is making every round more desperate!
